articles.title: Capital A rejected RM500m Danajamin loan due to unreasonable terms, says CEO Tony Fernandes - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (March 11): Tan Sri Tony Fernandes, chief executive officer of Capital A Bhd (formerly known as AirAsia Group Bhd), has clarified that the group decided not to proceed with a club facility of up to RM500 million under the Danajamin Prihatin Guara…
